# Description

My work on individual differences in language use is positioned at the intersection of quantitative psychology, philosophy of language, and cognitive linguistics. I have expertise in the fields of concepts and categories, semantics, and psychometrics.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Steven Verheyen"
special_skill <- c("multiverse analysis", "replication")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("open source software", all_of(special_skill), "data sharing", "data management", "preregistration", "open access", "reproducible analysis"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
